name: My Games Companion (Dead by Daylight)
description:
This application is a game companion for multiple games.  For this first version (version G1) there is only a Dead by Daylight's game companion. Future updates will allow to add new games or improve old ones. Don't hesitate to put suggestions in comments.

Dead by Daylight Features:

  • Create survivor and killer perk builds,
  • Save all your builds in one place,
  • See all perks on one page.
